name: Do you have an invite?
description:
Made for the 2020 48hr Yogscast Jingle Game Jam.

Dungeon Crawler with some "surprises"

Programmer - Ben Chittenden (https://benchittenden.itch.io/)

Artist - Amberlea Hoare-Foote (https://amberleahoare-foote.itch.io/)

Level and Sound Design - Josh Couchman (https://joshhyyy.itch.io/)
